QuestData.Title: Rifle the Bodies
QuestData.Description: The Moonrest Gardens to the southwest were the final resting place of a noble group of Highborne elves. It was also a powerful ley line nexus.$B$BThe blue dragonflight used a magical device they call a surge needle to destroy that nexus, freeing the power to redirect at their will.$B$BI need more information and I hope that you will get it for me.$B$BAfter the upheaval at the ruins, the ghosts of the Highborne rose up and decimated half of the mage hunters present. Go rifle their corpses for clues.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find the Moonrest Gardens Plans and return them to the Image of Archmage Modera at Stars' Rest.
QuestData.CompletionText: You have returned. What did you uncover?
QuestData.RewardText: Curious, they seek an accord with the Ethereum. The ethereals could prove a powerful ally for Malygos and his madness.$B$BThis will not do!
